alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dunklin County through 600 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Qulin, or 7 miles north of Chalk Bluff Natural Area, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malden, Campbell, Glennonville, Brian, Valley Ridge, Providence, McGuires, Morris State Park, Wilhelmina and Townley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
